hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD7$ tens and $\purpleD2$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{72}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/292fb4cc3f7440cec74b57d98a7618adcc3c7583)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ tens and $\maroonD5$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{25}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a5b9ffc08967099fc88535b0dcfbf658b0ece266)

Our sum shows $9$ tens and $7$ ones, or $97$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/bf3efd4bbd0fe516e8f36f80f53dcf0f45d28989)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{72} + \maroonD{25} = 97$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/271df1978d1349df70815f050257f435a51f3694)

[[☃ radio 1]]
